data.message: i don,t know if its em but if it is her me out i dont want what you created to die if you do see this like it i want you to know my idol i loved you scents i  was a little kid you where always on my mind for music instead of class it was morning school mornings eminem recess eminem lunch eminem every day hour i had no friends not enough so you were mine it was eminem untill beautiful and the wtp all the extra good stuff you put out but once you left i had to become thrash i couldnt just stand the new day and age so i was stolen but now i see the underground coming back but i don't see it coming back how i want it or the other down dead hearted fans so im practising for you the rap god my rap favourite rap fans my whole world. My fucking christ i shall not fail you as an evil poet a smooth fast pace writer or a good metaphor cause i coulda wrote a rap as a young kid but no rythem i was like 10 so picked up a guitar realy fast so i said to myself the other day i wanna be with mad child i was trying to hit him up even went to his web page no replies so if i dont get what i want i molde what the fuck i want so for you slim shady my idole doc dre who helped him and for nwa making rap everything funky and getting the start on im hear for youre sound and its gonna be fast good with bloooood sweat and tears over the hills and near (like the comment die hard fans)
